mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HR.VIDEO_TB (VIDEO_ID, VIDEO_USER_ID, VIDEO_TITLE, VIDEO_CONTENT, VIDEO_HIT, VIDEO_URLS, VIDEO_URLO, VIDEO_AD, VIDEO_INDATE, VIDEO_CLASS, VIDEO_PUBLIC, VIDEO_AGELIMIT, VIDEO_THUMBNAILS, VIDEO_THUMBNAILO, VIDEO_COPYRIGHT, VIDEO_MOTION) VALUES(videoSQL.nextval, #{video_user_id}, #{video_title}, #{video_content}, #{video_hit}, #{video_urlS}, #{video_urlO}, #{video_ad}, sysdate , #{video_class} , #{video_public} , #{video_ageLimit} , #{video_thumbnailS}, #{video_thumbnailO}, #{video_copyright} , #{video_motion} )
